kDesc

Urban chic is the way forward as juicy colours are mixed with the season's androgynous style. Reveal a little midriff for a sexy feminine touch.

 This pack includes the following:
 • Drey Powder Blue Turn-Up Trousers
 • Drey Blush Pink Cropped Tie Front Tee
 • Drey Tan Leather Saddle Bag
 • Drey Dusk Blue Woven Trilby
 • Drey Tan Leather Platform Knot Detail Sandal
 • Drey Crisp White Turn-Up Trousers
 • Drey White Cropped Tie Front Tee
 • Drey Sleek White Leather Saddle Bag
 • Drey Wicked White Woven Trilby
 • White Leather Platform Knot Detail Sandal
 • Drey Citrine Tortoiseshell Glasses
 • Drey Chocolate Tortoiseshell Glasses
 [#Legal]
